column5: Beautiful restored 1920's Heights Bungalow. Enjoy staying in one of the most sought after neighborhoods in Houston-- the historic Heights is full of hip coffee shops, and buzzed about restaurants and bars.  Our charming family guest home has large front porch with incredible views of downtown, a huge fenced yard, and fabulous back deck with grill and fire pit. Walk to White Oak Music Hall in 10min. Walking access to restaurants, parks, and White Oak Bayou. close to rail.
